column4: i just tried that, it thinks every letter of 'reconfigure' is a switch assigned to dpkg
there has to be a space
dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg doesn't work, says "need an action option"
got it working, what driver? it doesn't have intel listed
is there a package i need to get?
yeah the i810 driver, but thats the one i am already using and its incorrect
i think i will try with the nv driver and see what happens
nope, its just a generic intel onboard
do you have the xserver-video-intel package installed?
ok, which release are you using? Gutsy?
ok just type sudo apt-get install xserver-xorg-video-intel
odd. are you trying to fix resolution?
ok do you have all the repositories enabled?
